main.name: Zachary Vallarino
main.bio:
Hi, I'm Zach! As a full stack software developer with a background in healthcare and supply chain management, I'm excited to contribute to the AI-driven supply chain industry. Passionate about crafting efficient solutions, I embrace challenges and stay up to date with the latest Programming/AI trends.
With my expertise in procurement orchestration and strong foundation in programming and data analysis, I'm eager to leverage my skills to implement cutting-edge technologies that drive value. Let's build something cool together!
main.contactmessage: Please reach out to me if you want to work together!

work.title: Junior Full Stack Software Engineer
work.description: Collaborated in the Innovation Lab, enhancing research capabilities through web scrapers for social media, Discord sentiment analysis bots, and other tools. Developed applications for the developing world, focused on health and tech resources, including safety, epidemiology, sexual education, and more. Contributed to data reorganization by helping build a centralized repository to hold and standardize company data. Worked with Microsoft to implement OpenAI/ChatGPT, identifying opportunities for AI integration in the organization

work.company: Premier Healthcare/New York Health and Hospital
work.title: Manager, Software and Imaging Contracts
work.description: Automized a Capital Equipment Excel software cutting down user error and improved tracking of the equipment

work.title: Contractor, Strategic Sourcing
work.description: Managed 30+ contracts, totaling $100M in net spend across all product categories

work.title: Manager, Global & Pharmacy Sourcing
work.description: Spearheaded projects that produced $17M in savings in 2017, $210M in cost avoidance, and $19M in savings in 2016. Developed Bloomberg-connected spreadsheets summarizing product pricing and their raw materials

testimonials.text: Sonny is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Learning with Sonny has been AWESOME, he makes learning React so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
